type.description:
## On Fire

---



[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/on_fire)

Checks if the entity is currently burning.

Type ID: `origins:on_fire`




---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:on_fire"
}
```
